name: ext_R5_ResearchSubject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ResearchSubject for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ResearchSubject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchSubject|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: Participant or object which is the recipient of investigative activities in a study
element.definition: A ResearchSubject is a participant or object which is the recipient of investigative activities in a research study.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).
